name: War Saber
description:
War Saber is the first VR game to simulate true energy-based saber combat using advanced physics and enemy dismemberment. The game allows players to take on the role of a future soldier wielding powerful armor featuring gravity manipulation and teleportation capabilities. Sandbox-style maps designed specifically for the game’s unique mechanics create the potential for truly epic battles across diverse settings. Grab your saber and become the ultimate future warrior today.

Features:
- True physics-based saber combat
- Full enemy dismemberment and environment slicing
- Telekinesis style gravity manipulation abilities
- Unique movement system combining free locomotion and teleportation
- 3 custom maps
- Player body presence
- Explorable hub
